author: sky.cactus
content: Such a change would create a significant increased security risk for validators because it would mean that if someone acquires the validator keys they would be able to steal the stake.

author: sky.cactus
content: Validator keys are very hot, and the withdraw address is meant to be cold.  It would be bad to give more power than necessary to the hot keys.
